where you go and you create the the asset so you take a photo for instance or you go into Photoshop and you start

that this photo was taken at these GPS coordinates that this assertion was taken by this camera that this assertion
was taken by this person and you put all those assertions together in an overall claim and then you digitally sign that
claim now you'll notice that I'm saying phrases like assertion and claim name I'm not using words like truth or facts
or guarantees right um that's because the one thing that one thing that you're
able to verify is who signed it um everything else is a claim that's
being made by the person or the tool that signed it so you know I could be lying to you
but then I have to actually ass my name to those lies or my tool has to sign my name to those lies and that allows you
to track things over time to see who's been uh lying to you
um and this implementation is based on existing standards we're trying to not reinvent the wheel as much as we can so
